con:configuration.script:
def reservationQuantity = context.expand( '${#[Test Suite for Product Reservation Business Interaction#Test Case 2 - External#Given properties for the test steps]#reservationQuantity}' ).toInteger();
return reservationQuantity -1;

def stockInQuantity = context.expand( '${#[Test Suite for Product Reservation Business Interaction#Test Case 2 - External#Given properties for the test steps]#stockInQuantity}' )
return stockInQuantity

def reservationQuantity = context.expand( '${#[Test Suite for Product Reservation Business Interaction#Test Case 2 - External#Given properties for the test steps]#reservationQuantity}' )
return reservationQuantity
